item.title: By: amynotdorft
item.dc:creator: amynotdorft
item.description:
This is a lovely article, and thank you for listing my post as a source! I love the iyashikei genre and interestingly Howl's Moving Castle is one of my top comfort reads. Over the next three or four years after writing "Iyashikei and Worlds That Heal" I ended up writing a magical slice-of-life web fiction series called 53 Ganymede. It aims to be meditative and healing without entirely avoiding difficult topics. Shameless self-plug there lol.
I haven't had a chance to read it, but I frequently stumble on recommendations for a book called The Healer's Road by S.E. Robertson that is supposed to be a very gently fantasy story. Hoping to pick it up soon.
